tests.prompt: Open the equipment UI. Can you see both equipment slots and inventory without scrolling?
Look at the inventory items. Do different item types (weapons, armor, shields) have distinct icons?
Select an inventory item and click a slot to equip it. Then unequip it. Does the flow work smoothly?
From the lobby screen before readying up, can you access the equipment UI to check/change gear?
In a multiplayer game, can you see all party members with their ready states and character info?
